string.name: home_string
string.font: The home screen shows you your weekly goal progress, and a button to the exercise screen.

string.name: intro_string
string.font: You can use the bottom navigation bar to switch screens.

string.name: action_string
string.font: You can press the Info Button at the top at any time to review these tutorials.

string.name: help_string
string.font: If you need help setting up the exercise, press the Help Button at the top, or swipe left on any screen.

string.name: exercising
string.font: Exercising

string.name: exercise_string
string.font: Welcome to the Exercise Screen. This is where you will configure and start an exercise.

string.name: edif_string
string.font: You can toggle the difficulty between ordered (predictable) or random.

string.name: etime_string
string.font: Set the time like a stopwatch. No more than 15 minutes, no less than 5!

string.name: espeed_string
string.font: Slide the speed slower or faster, between +50% and -50%.

string.name: e_string
string.font: When you\'re all set press start - after a brief countdown the exercise will start. You may pause and stop at anytime.

string.name: h_title
string.font: History - Week to Week

string.name: d_title
string.font: History - Details

string.name: h_string
string.font: This is the history screen. You can see your week to week goal completion percentage for the past 3 weeks. Tapping any percent bubble gives you more information...

string.name: d_string
string.font: When you tap a percent bubble, you will be presented with a scrollable view of your individual goal completion for that week!

string.name: sgoals_title
string.font: Settings - Goals

string.name: s_string
string.font: Welcome to the settings screen. This is where you can tweak app settings, as well as change your goals.

string.name: sf_string
string.font: Sometimes text is hard to see. You can adjust the size in settings.

string.name: so_string
string.font: You may change the names of the targets that you place for the exercise if you'd like.

string.name: sv_string
string.font: Sometimes it\'s hard to hear what people say. You can adjust how loud the app talks in settings.

string.name: sg_string
string.font: If you\'d like to revisit your goals, you can change them at any time in the settings.
